ResearchProjectDef.label: Logistic Pod System
ResearchProjectDef.description: An assortment of large transport pods exclusively designed to transfer large quantities of Chemfuel, Oil, Helixien Gas, or Water over a great distance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KC-3 Atlas Tanker
ResearchProjectDef.description: A small supersonic stealth tanker designed to travel with fighter squadrons or forward operating units. The KC-3 Atlas has no military application outside of logistics; however, it can fly through enemy airspace generally unnoticed. In exchange for stealth, speed, and agility has the smallest storage tank of the tanker fleet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KC-7 Poseidon Tanker
ResearchProjectDef.description: The KC-7 is rare to see on the glitterwolrd planets and unheard of on the outer rim planets. A handful of these can keep up with fuel production for an entire glitterworld plant. The demands placed on this ship exceed the capability of simple combustion engines and requires an on board nuclear reactor.
